abstract: For the Bertolli line of frozen foods, Unilever is turning to the Logo cable channel, part of the MTV Networks unit of Viacom, to create a customized commercial for its audience.
snippet: For the Bertolli line of frozen foods, Unilever is turning to the Logo cable channel, part of the MTV Networks unit of Viacom, to create a customized commercial for its audience.
lead_paragraph: A giant marketer is again sponsoring a campaign for one of its mainstream food brands that is aimed at gay and lesbian consumers.
